headline: Has the Market Repriced Las Vegas Sands Enough After Its Strong 2025 Rally?
summary: If you are wondering whether Las Vegas Sands at around $66 a share still offers upside, or if most of the easy money has already been made, this article will walk through what the current price really bakes in. The stock is roughly flat over the last week at -0.3% and up 1.0% over the last month. Its 32.9% year-to-date and 30.5% 1-year gains, alongside a 50.4% 3-year return, show investors have been steadily re-rating the story. Recently, the market has been reacting to a steady drumbeat of...
